title: 495. Why Are There So Many Bad Bosses?
description: People who are good at their jobs routinely get promoted into bigger jobs they’re bad at. We explain why firms keep producing incompetent managers — and why that’s unlikely to change.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
